thread.title: Pic of Emma Watson befriending 'Harry Potter' fan resurfaces
thread.title_full: Pic of Emma Watson befriending 'Harry Potter' fan resurfaces | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: Pic of Emma Watson befriending 'Harry Potter' fan resurfaces
text:
Published October 26, 2015 FoxNews.com Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print
When Emma Watson came across a little boy dressed up as Harry Potter in New York a few years ago, the actress played along, and the resulting photo went viral.
Now, with Halloween fast approaching, the adorable photo is making the rounds yet again.
Watson reportedly asked the boy, "Excuse me, are you Harry Potter?" To which the little boy excitedly answered, "Yes."
Watson then hugged the small fan and replied, "That's great, because I'm Hermione Granger and we're best of friends!"
Walking through New York during Halloween, Emma Watson saw a young boy dressed up as Harry Potter. She asked him, "...
Posted by Movies Now | Watch Hollywood in HD on Friday, October 16, 2015
Watson starred as Hermione Granger in the 8 "Harry Potter" films. She will star as Belle in the upcoming 2017 film "Beauty and the Beast."
Lea Thompson shares stories from 'Back to the Future'
